original_title: The future of travel - is sustainable possible?
overview: Exotic destinations, or staycations? As we make choices like these, we ask ourselves: Will we ever be able to fly without feeling guilty again? This film examines the tourism business today, and asks how the industry envisages the future.
tagline: deutsche welle, dw, docfilm,documentary,sustainable tourism, flight shame, climate crisis, carbon footprint, travel
title: The future of travel - is sustainable possible?
